name: Overcooked Clone Prototype
description:
A very early and barely playable prototype re-creating the mechanics of Overcooked; where a weapon smith  combines raw materials in his forge to create items for traveling adventurers.Inspired by the fast-paced puzzler, Overcooked
Instructions:Items can be combined in "equipment" (Forge, Anvil, Temperer, etc.) to transform raw materials into finished goods.The player must create the items requested on the left-hand side (i.e. weapons requested by adventurers)
